entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 5.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Harbour 3:00 PM PDT Friday 24 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 5.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 83 %
Dewpoint: 2.9°C
Wind: SW 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday: A few showers. High 9.
entry.summary: Showers. Wind southwest 30 km/h except 60 near Juan de Fuca Strait late this afternoon. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h except 60 near Juan de Fuca Strait this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Friday 24 March 2023
